tr.td: St. Lawrence wins toss, defers - Morrisville to receive
Zach McAuley kickoff 57 yards to the MORR8, Anthony Mella return 8 yards to the MORR16 (Tyler Mirabile).
Cory Benedetto pass incomplete to Anthony Gray.
Cristian Pena rush for 8 yards to the MORR24 (C.Brown-Wallace;Ryan Byrne).
